changeSet.sql: create sequence campaign_application_seq; create table if not exists campaign_application ( id bigint not null constraint campaign_application_pkey primary key, first_name varchar(255), last_name varchar(255), company_name varchar(255), website varchar(255), email varchar(255), phone_number varchar(255), previously_raised numeric(19,2), funding_goals bigint, content varchar(10000), request_state_id bigint constraint campaign_application_fk_on_request_state references request_state );
